python-dandelion
================

Connect to the dandelion.eu API in a very pythonic way!


Installation
------------

``dandelion-eu`` is available on PyPI_ install it simply with::

    pip install dandelion-eu


Documentation
-------------

Documentation is available on ReadTheDocs_.
